data.name: 缓冲装置

WithPassiveSkills.name: 缓冲装置
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 遭受伤害时有<color=#F74848>25%</color>的概率发动，护甲值提升<color=#F74848>25%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 缓冲装置
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 遭受伤害时有<color=#F74848>40%</color>的概率发动，护甲值提升<color=#F74848>30%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 缓冲装置
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 遭受伤害时有<color=#F74848>55%</color>的概率发动，护甲值提升<color=#F74848>35%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 缓冲装置
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 遭受伤害时有<color=#F74848>70%</color>的概率发动，护甲值提升<color=#F74848>45%</color>

data.introduce: 缓冲装置对机兵表面的装甲进行改良，在不影响原构造的情况下叠增纤维甲层，使其获得更强的防护能力。
